name: Arc War
description:
Battle infinite waves of alien invaders in Arc War!

Earth is under attack from a massive alien fleet. Pilot your ship along the intercontinental arc and destroy as many of the alien invaders as you can. You are the planet's only hope!

Key Features:

- Endless Gameplay
- 17 Types of Enemy Ship
- 6 Types of Boss Encounters
- 7 Different Power Ups
- 14 Game Center Achievements to earn
- Game Center High Score Leader Board

Find us on Facebook - facebook.com/huntedcow
Follow us on Twitter - @HuntedCow

Thank you for supporting our games!
